name: Cheat the dice
description:
Sometime the dice is not showing you what you were aiming for.

This time you have the chance to cheat!

Place the force arrow on the position of the dice you want to give force at, hold the left mouse button as long as much force you want to apply and  then: release ! let´s have a look whether you have your number of choice now ! If so : great! Otherwise: retry! Good luck
